snippet: The British bank bucked the industry trend of weak earnings, reporting that its net income jumped 11 percent in the first half of the year on strength in Asia and other emerging markets.
abstract: The British bank bucked the industry trend of weak earnings, reporting that its net income jumped 11 percent in the first half of the year on strength in Asia and other emerging markets.

headline.main: Standard Chartered Profit Up 11% on Emerging-Markets Strength
